content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position: 16.0, 71.0)
- Wooden chest (position: 16.5, 72.5) to collect iron ore
- Stone furnace (position: 18.0, 73.0) to smelt iron ore
- Burner inserter (position: 19.5, 73.5) to transfer iron ore from chest to furnace

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when inserting items into furnace without having the required items in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the furnace.

#### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with insufficient spacing
- Ensure there is sufficient spacing between entities when placing them next to each other. Consider increasing the spacing or changing the direction of placement.

#### Common issues with entity placement
- Be aware of nearby entities that might be blocking the placement of new entities. Consider changing the direction or reference position of the entity being placed.

### NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 

Important variables:
- `chest`: Wooden chest entity at position (16.5, 72.5) of type `Entity`
- `furnace`: Stone furnace entity at position (18.0, 73.0) of type `Entity`
- `inserter`: Burner inserter entity at position (19.5, 73.5) of type `Entity`
